description: A hand holding a smartphone displaying a health insurance policy with a highlighted section for 'Non-Medical Expenses Cover'. The background is a colorful abstract representation of financial security.
A cheerful family enjoying a vacation, with a thought bubble above their heads showing the Non-Medical Expenses Cover policy document and a checkmark signifying peace of mind.
A person in a business suit pointing at a chart illustrating the benefits of Non-Medical Expenses Cover, with a background of a city skyline representing financial stability.
A graphic showing a large, colorful medical cross with a smaller, outlined cross representing the Non-Medical Expenses Cover alongside it, indicating it is a supplementary benefit.

A stylized illustration of a hand holding a protective shield, with the words 'Non-Medical Expenses Cover' embossed on it. The shield is surrounded by images of everyday life, like travel, education, and entertainment.
